relevant_findings.general: Afebrile, appeared to be in considerable distress, thin.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rhythm without extra heart sounds, no jugular venous distention, no lower-extremity edema.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Breath sounds normal in both lungs.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft and nontender, normal bowel sounds, no organomegaly or lymphadenopathy.

relevant_findings.white_cell_count: Subsequently decreased to 13,800 per cubic millimeter with 91% neutrophils.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: White-cell count and platelets decreased; hemoglobin also decreased.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: High fasting glucose level raises concern about possible diabetes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial fasting glucose level of 192 mg/dL decreased to 109 mg/dL on repeat measurement.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No further angina or bleeding reported.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Ejection fraction improved from initial 40% to 50%.
